member.name: IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_SETTING
member.summary: Defines the digital copy setting values available for a given track.

member.name: IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_SETTING.IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_PERMITTED
member.summary: Digital copies of the given track are allowed.

member.name: IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_SETTING.IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_PROHIBITED
member.summary: Digital copies of the given track are not allowed using consumer electronics CD recorders. This condition typically has no effect on PC-based CD players.

member.name: IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_SETTING.IMAPI_CD_TRACK_DIGITAL_COPY_SCMS
member.summary: The given track is a digital copy of a copy protected track. No further copies using consumer electronics CD recorders will be allowed. This condition typically has no effect on PC-based CD players.
